channel.title: Bayesian on NeuronStar
channel.description: Recent content in Bayesian on NeuronStar

item.title: Least Squares, Bootstrap, Maximum Likelihood, and Bayesian
item.description: Least squares, bootstrap, maximum likelihood, and maximum posterior leads to the same results in many cases.

item.title: Conditional Probability and Bayes
item.description: The Bayesian view of probability is quite objective and also more general than the frequentist’s view. It doesn’t rely on repeatition of events.
